title: Lum-Ka-Naad
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Modernly decorated Thai restaurant featuring dishes from Northern and Central Thailand as well as the familiar Southern style cuisine. Extensive menu includes unique dishes like South sea spice dried curry; tum kanoon made from jackfruit and spices; and tum makua, a well-seasoned eggplant salad. Authentic Thai cuisine is very spicy so be sure to request mild if necessary. Vegan selections are clearly marked, though food is stored and prepared with meat.
